DOC.brief_summary: To explore pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single dose two different formulation ACT-129968 , i.e. , tablet versus capsule evaluate safety tolerability single dose two different formulation ACT-129968 , i.e. , tablet versus capsule .
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Subjects Assess Pharmacokinetics , Safety , Tolerability Two Formulations ACT-129968
DOC.detailed_description: A total 10 female 10 male healthy subject enrol attend two treatment period , separate 7-9 day washout . Over two period , two formulation ACT-129968 ( Treatment A : two capsule , 250 mg ; Treatment B : one tablet , 500 mg ) administer sequence A/B B/A 10 subject ( 5 female 5 male ) per sequence determine randomization .
